description: Manages deploy keys for GitHub repositories.

read_only.description: If C(true), the deploy key will only be able to read repository contents. Otherwise, the deploy key will be able to read and write.

force.description: If C(true), forcefully adds the deploy key by deleting any existing deploy key with the same public key or title.

name.description: The name for the deploy key.

token.description: The OAuth2 token or personal access token to authenticate with. Mutually exclusive with I(password).

repo.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

otp.description: The 6 digit One Time Password for 2-Factor Authentication. Required together with I(username) and I(password).

state.description: The state of the deploy key.

key.description: The SSH public key to add to the repository as a deploy key.

owner.description: The name of the individual account or organization that owns the GitHub repository.

password.description: The password to authenticate with. A personal access token can be used here in place of a password.
